album.strDescriptionEN: Miss E ...So Addictive is the third studio album by American rapper by Missy "Misdemeanor" Elliott. The album spawned the massive club and R&B/hip-hop hits "One Minute Man", featuring Ludacris and Trina, and "Get Ur Freak On", as well as the international club hit "4 My People" and the less commercially-successful single "Take Away".
